channel.title: Delta Magic GFX - Change Stillgfx to spec gfx?
channel.description:
[size=15pt][center][b]Okay not sure about this entirely but for example on deltascape, when you cast ice barrage on a moving player,
the barrage gfx appears where the player was when you casted it and not where he is when he becomes frozen,
I know this has something to do with how delta's magic uses stillgfx things,
so could anyone care to enlighten me on how I could perhaps Fix / change this?[/b][/center][/size]

item.title: Delta Magic GFX - Change Stillgfx to spec gfx?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:1, topic:267905”][size=15pt][center][b]Okay not sure about this entirely but for example on deltascape, when you cast ice barrage on a moving player,

the barrage gfx appears where the player was when you casted it and not where he is when he becomes frozen,

I know this has something to do with how delta’s magic uses stillgfx things,

so could anyone care to enlighten me on how I could perhaps Fix / change this?[/b][/center][/size][/quote]

Make it check the players location then initialize the graphic instead of initializing the graphic before checking if the players location is updated.

Read full topic
